channel.title: How do i make myself owner on project 16 server
channel.description:
i just started it and dont know how to make myself owner and others mods and admins
plz help

item.title: How do i make myself owner on project 16 server
item.dc:creator: @Steen Steen
item.description:
@Steen wrote:

If already have an acc:
Go to character files, open (Yourname).txt, edit the rights.
It is now like this

[code][ACCOUNT]
character-username = steen
character-password = zaqwsx

[CHARACTER]
character-height = Your height
character-posx = Your X pos
character-posy = Your Y pos[/code]
character-rights = 0[code]
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = localhost
character-lastlogin = 20070502
character-energy = 100
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 0

[EQUIPMENT]

[LOOK]

[SKILLS]

[ITEMS]

[BANK]

[FRIENDS]

[IGNORES]

[EOF][/code]

0 = Normal player. Like all us at norm Rs.
1 = Moderator. Silver crown.
2 = Admin. Gold crown.
3 = Owner. Cant see they own crown, others can. Wanna see your crown? http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,49068.0.html
4 = Spy. No crown, if someone hacks ur server to change itself, it makes itself Spy.

You best make yourself owner.

Not played?
Put all the Java files in the folder with compiler and runserver, compile, and then classes apear, runserver.bat
Go to your client, make the ip Localhost and log in.
(Note: Dont have JDK 5.0 or 6.0, search here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=search2 For it.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make myself owner on project 16 server
